name: Use of style sheets
description:
This metric detects the pages where a Style sheet (*.css) is not directly or explicitly used.
Style sheet (*.css) should be used (instead of no css or hardcoded style definition like style= ).
output:
This report lists all pages not directly or explicitly using a style sheet. 
It provides the following information: Page name
rationale: By using a style sheet, you ensure that the display is the same across the website. It allows to centralize maintenance of pages look and feel.
